traits.name: Assault Shield
traits.description: '{On Crit}: {Shields} the ally with the lowest amount of {Shield} for {1}.'

traits.name: Burning Mark
traits.description: Allies gain +{0%} {Crit Chance} against enemies for every stack of {Burn} on them.

traits.name: Critical Aether
traits.description: 'On every {0} [Crits]: Generates {Wild} [Aether].'

traits.name: Critical Hybridization
traits.description: '{On Crit}: Deals a {3} {Wild Damage} [Hit].'

traits.name: Critical Purging
traits.description: 'On every {0} [Crits]: {Purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Cruelty
traits.description: 'At the start of combat and whenever an enemy is staggered: Applies {1} {Force} to self.'

traits.name: Evasion Mastery
traits.description: '{Crit Chance} on allies also increases their {Evasion} by {0%} of that amount.'

traits.name: Hunt
traits.description: Allies gain +{0%} {Crit Chance}.

traits.name: Sidecrits
traits.description: This monster’s {Sidekick} {Attack} is always {critical}.

traits.name: Sleight of Hand
traits.description: +{0} {Crit Damage}. Every {third} [Hit] of an {Action} is a {Critical Hit}. For multi-target {Actions}, it is every {second} hit against each enemy instead.

traits.name: Toxic Assault
traits.description: 'On every {0} [Crits]: Applies {1} {Poison}, then triggers {Poison}.'

traits.name: Vigorous Edge
traits.description: Your allies gain +{0%} {Crit Chance} for every {Regeneration} stack on them. Each {Attack} consumes [1] {Regeneration}.

traits.name: Aether Fiend
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally {purges} or {steals} [Aether]: Generates {1} additional [Aether] of the same element. Allies take {0} more damage from all [Hits].'

traits.name: Aggressive Purging
traits.description: 'On every {0} [Attacks] from allies: {Purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Controlled Burn
traits.description: 'For every Aether {purged} or {stolen} by allies: Applies {1} {Burn} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Burn}.'

traits.name: Disruptive Prime
traits.description: 'For every {0} [Aether] {purged} or {stolen} by this monster: Applies {Power} to self.'

traits.name: Exploit
traits.description: '{On Interrupt}: Applies {Sidekick} to self.'

traits.name: Poise Purging
traits.description: 'Whenever this Monster {purges} or {steals} [Aether]: Breaks {1} {Poise} of the same element on all enemies.'

traits.name: Purge Punishment
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: If this monster has {C0%} or more health, {purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Shock
traits.description: '{On Interrupt}: Deals a {3} {Fire}/{Wind} damage [Hit] to that enemy.'

traits.name: Split Aether
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Consumes up to one {Wild} [Aether] to deal a {0;3} {Wild Damage} [Hit] and {purge} {1;1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Tormentor
traits.description: '{On Interrupt}: Applies {0;1} {Terror} to that enemy and heals self for {1;1}.'

traits.name: Age of Fire
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} {Age}: Applies {Burn} stacks to all enemies equal to half of the amount of {Age} stacks on this monster.'

traits.name: Beacon
traits.description: 'Whenever one or more {Regeneration} stacks are consumed by an ally: Consumes a {Burn} stack on a random enemy to apply another {Regeneration} stack to the ally.'

traits.name: Burning Desire
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Burn} applied to enemies: {Shields} all allies for {1}.'

traits.name: Burning Fire
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Fire} [Aether] consumed by allies: Applies {Burn} to all enemies.'

traits.name: Cosmic Fire
traits.description: Every [3rd] {Fire} [Aether] generated by your allies is converted into {Wild} [Aether]. {Wild} [Aether] also counts as {Fire} [Aether] for the effects of your skills.

traits.name: Electrical Burn
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy reaches [5] {Burn} stacks: Deals a {Fire}/{Wind} [Hit] with {3} damage to that enemy and applies {Dodge} to self.'

traits.name: Enkindled Aether
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Consumes up to one {Fire} [Aether] to deal a {0;3} {Fire} damage [Hit] and apply {1;1} {Burn} to {target enemy}.'

traits.name: Kindle
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Burn} applied to enemies: Generates {Fire} [Aether].'

traits.name: Overheat
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Triggers {Burn} on each enemy with {C0} or more {Burn} and applies {1;1} {Burn} to this monster for each one.'

traits.name: Overwhelming Heat
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Applies {1} Burn to target enemy for every {Power} stack on this monster.'

traits.name: Rapid Fire
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy gets {attacked} for the second time in the same turn: Triggers {Burn} on them.'

traits.name: Rising Fire
traits.description: 'Whenever {Burn} triggers on an enemy: Applies {Burn} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Burn}.'
